text: @realDonaldTrump You are responsible for sending a lot of our citizens to the hospitals. Your administration did nothing to stop COVID-19 from impacting America. And you are still trying to deny us help and information. November can’t get here fast enough!!!  Joe 2020!!!!!!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
